details.fellowshipSong: I Will Sing the Wondrous Story #537
details.song: Stand Up, Stand Up for Jesus #485

list: The Sunday School Picnic is tonight at 6:00 PM at the Deaton’s barn. We will have smoked brisket and pork. Please bring sides and desserts.
If you missed signing up for the prayer chain last week, you can still sign up on the sheet in the foyer.
